availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James A. Mattingly (Breckinridge County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Breckinridge County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of William Mattingly and Barbara Mattingly. Married to Lucinda Mattingly. Father of Sarah E. Mattingly. Farmer in Breckinridge County in 1850 and 1860.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Breckinridge County, District No. 2, p. 92A.Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Breckinridge County, District No. 2, p. 75.
